divs: Sighting DetailsI got up at about 425 am and went out to the back yard. I always look up when im out.I love the stars.I turned to come in and a bright light caught my eye, so i turned and seen the light was getting brighter. It finally stop getting brighter and just stayed there for about 3 mins maybe less. Then it faded out. The light was "white" I have never seen anything like it.I stopped and listened and heard not crash. I have looked every where to find a answer and have have not been able to find out what this was. Please help if you can. maybe some one some where has info i hope
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around November 12th 2011
Summary: seen light in sky it cought my eye and i turned and it got bright, really bright,stay that way then faded out.
